body:
## What's Changed
* Refactor test mocking by @awdeorio in https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/pull/128
* GitHub Actions CI by @awdeorio in https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/pull/132
* Drop Python 2 Support by @awdeorio in https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/pull/131
* Kill a pylint exception by @awdeorio in https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/pull/134
* Remove sh dependency by @awdeorio in https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/pull/133
* Bug Fix: CSV with BOM by @awdeorio in https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/pull/135
* Linter updates by @awdeorio in https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/pull/138
* Update dependency "html5 to "html5lib" by @thunderbirdtr in https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/pull/136

## New Contributors
* @thunderbirdtr made their first contribution in https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/pull/136

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/awdeorio/mailmerge/compare/2.2.0...2.2.1
